name: GachaLive
description:
GachaLive

Imagine how much money you would spend on rolling the gacha for your favorite Hololive talent. Well you don't have to imagine it with this extremely convenient and accurate tool. Obtain an estimate of your next credit card bill instantly as we simulate your total required investment to get that SSS-rarity Tokino Sora card.

Disclaimer
  • Google Chrome is recommended for performance.
  • This is a free fangame. I'm not affiliated nor endorsed by Hololive, Cover Corp, or any vtubers that appear in this game. Feel free to download the game using the links below.
  • My Japanese is incredibly bad but I made the decision to include them for completeness so any corrections are welcome.
  • This game is not dark-mode friendly due to bad design choices of the creator.
Potential Questions
  • What is the difference between characters and rarities?
    • Higher rarities have a lower drop rate but otherwise every single card is the same, except Miko cards which have a 90% chance of losing in rock-paper-scissors.
  • Why is the Alternative video here?
    • Godot has a video player component so I thought it would fun to try it out.
  • Why is so-and-so's outfit no here?
    • I made the idiotic decision initially to only have full  body images, so if I couldn't get a decent image, I couldn't include it.
  • Will you include the other generations?
    • Currently I don't really have plans since this is just a small fun project and the existing 5 JP generations already took quite a bit of time.
